entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
